title: Tumpak Sewu Waterfall
caption: Tumpak Sewu Waterfall is a tiered waterfall that is located between the Pronojiwo District, Lumajang Regency.

title: Komodo Island
caption: Komodo Island is an island located in the Nusa Tenggara Islands, which is separated by the Sape Strait.

title: National Monument
caption: National Monument is a 132 m obelisk in the centre of Merdeka Square, Central Jakarta.

title: Waerebo Village
caption: The traditional village of Wae Rebo in the district of Manggarai on the island of Flores, East Nusatenggara.

title: Jayawijaya Mountain
caption: The Jayawiya Mountain is a mountain range east of Maoke in the central highlands region of the Indonesian.

title: Lake Toba
caption: Lake Toba is 100 kilometers long, 30 kilometers wide and 508 meters deep. The lake is located in the middle of the northern part of the island of Sumatra.

title: Raja Ampat
caption: Is an archipelago located off the northwest tip of Bird's Head Peninsula on the island of New Guinea, in Indonesia's Southwest Papua province.

title: Mandalika
caption: The Mandalika International Circuit is a racing circuit located in the Mandalika Special Economic Zone in Central Lombok, West Nusa Tenggara.
